instructionsNepali: उम्मेदवारहरूलाई सकेसम्म आफ्नै शब्दमा उत्तर दिन आग्रह गरिन्छ। किनारामा रहेका अङ्कहरूले पूर्ण अङ्कलाई जनाउँछन्। सबै प्रश्नहरूको उत्तर दिनुहोस्।
instructionsEnglish: Candidates are required to answer the questions in their own words as far as practicable. Figures in the margin indicate the full marks. Attempt all the questions.

passage.contentNepali:
सानो सुरक्षित झुपडीमा एउटा मोटो सानो मुसा बस्थ्यो,
जसले, बिना कुनै बाधा, घरको आनन्द लिन्थ्यो;
सादा खानामा सन्तुष्ट, उसले बिहानको खाजामा चीज खान्थ्यो,
दिउँसोको खानामा बेकन, र रातीको खानामा खैरो केराउ।

सहरबाट एउटा साथी झुपडीतिर भटकियो,
र उसले भन्यो कि ऊ छोटो भेटघाटको लागि आएको हो;
त्यसैले मुसाले तिमीलाई खुसी पार्न आफ्नो टेबल सजायो,
र मिठो बेकन र मनमोहक खैरो केराउ ल्यायो।

पाहुनाले निधार खुम्च्यायो, र आफूलाई चलाख ठान्यो:
उसले चिच्यायो, "तिमीलाई थाहा हुनुपर्छ, म सहरबाट आएको हुँ,
जहाँ हामी सबै यस्ता खानेकुराहरू देख्दा छक्क पर्छौं,
किनकि हामी कहिल्यै बेकन र डरलाग्दो खैरो केराउ खाँदैनौं।"
passage.contentEnglish:
In a snug little cot lived a fat little mouse,
Who enjoyed, unmolested, the range of the house;
With plain food content, she would breakfast on cheese,
She dined upon bacon, and supped on grey peas.

A friend from the town to the cottage did stray,
And he said he was come a short visit to pay;
So the mouse spread her table as gay as you please,
And brought the nice bacon and charming grey peas.

The visitor frowned, and he thought to be witty:
Cried he, “You must know, I come from the city,
Where we all should be shocked at provisions like these,
For we never eat bacon and horrid grey peas.”
passage.titleEnglish: The Country Mouse and the City Mouse

subQuestions.questionNepali: गाउँको मुसा कहाँ बस्थ्यो?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Where did the country mouse live?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: गाउँले मुसा सानो/आरामदायी सानो कटेरो (झुपडी) मा बस्थ्यो।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: The country mouse lived in a snug little cot (cottage).
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
कविताको पहिलो पङ्क्तिमा भनिएको छ, "In a snug little cot lived a fat little mouse," जसको अर्थ हो कि ग्रामीण मुसा एउटा सानो, आरामदायी कुटीमा बस्थ्यो।
उद्धरण: पाठ १७
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The first line of the poem states, "In a snug little cot lived a fat little mouse," which means the country mouse lived in a small, comfortable cottage. 
Citation: Lesson 17.

subQuestions.questionNepali: गाउँको मुसाले खानामा के खायो?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: What did the country mouse eat for her meals?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: उनले बिहानको खाजामा चीज, बेलुकाको खाना (dinner) मा बेकन र रातीको खाना (supper) मा खैरो केराउ खाइन्।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: She ate cheese for breakfast, bacon for dinner, and grey peas for supper.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
कविताले उल्लेख गर्छ, "she would breakfast on cheese, / She dined upon bacon, and supped on grey peas."
उद्धरण: पाठ १७
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The poem mentions, "she would breakfast on cheese, / She dined upon bacon, and supped on grey peas." 
Citation: Lesson 17.

subQuestions.questionNepali: सहरको मुसाले किन गाउँको मुसालाई भेट्यो?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Why did the city mouse visit the country mouse?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: उनी छोटो भेटघाटको लागि आए।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: He came to pay a short visit.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
कवितामा शहरी मुसाले भन्छ, "he was come a short visit to pay," जसको अर्थ हो कि ऊ छोटो भेटघाटको लागि आएको थियो।
उद्धरण: पाठ १७
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The city mouse says in the poem that "he was come a short visit to pay," meaning he came for a brief visit. 
Citation: Lesson 17.

subQuestions.questionNepali: सहरको मुसाले आफूलाई दिएको खानाप्रति कस्तो प्रतिक्रिया देखायो?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: How did the city mouse react to the food he was offered?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: उनले निधार खुम्च्याए र भने कि खाना एकदमै नराम्रो र डरलाग्दो थियो।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: He frowned and said that the food was shocking and horrid.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
कविताले भन्छ, "The visitor frowned... Cried he... 'we all should be shocked at provisions like these, / For we never eat bacon and horrid grey peas.'"
उद्धरण: पाठ १७
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The poem states, "The visitor frowned... Cried he... 'we all should be shocked at provisions like these, / For we never eat bacon and horrid grey peas.'" 
Citation: Lesson 17.

subQuestions.questionNepali: दोस्रो पङ्क्तिमा 'unmolested' शब्दको अर्थ के हो?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: What does the word 'unmolested' mean in the second line?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: यसको अर्थ अविचलित वा चिन्तित नभएको हो।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: It means undisturbed or not bothered.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
'Unmolested' को अर्थ हो कसैले दुःख नदिएको वा बाधा नपुर्याएको। मुसाले घरमा स्वतन्त्र रूपमा घुम्न पाउँथ्यो।
उद्धरण: पाठ १७
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
'Unmolested' means being left alone, undisturbed, or not bothered. The mouse enjoyed the range of the house without interference. 
Citation: Lesson 17.

subSections.titleNepali: तलका प्रश्नहरूको पूर्ण वाक्यमा उत्तर दिनुहोस्।
subSections.titleEnglish: Answer the following questions in full sentences.

questions.titleEnglish: Read the poem and do the tasks.

passage.contentNepali:
प्रताप मल्ल मल्ल वंशका सबैभन्दा प्रसिद्ध राजाहरू मध्ये एक थिए। उनले काठमाडौं वरिपरि केही भव्य र सुन्दर वास्तुकला संरचनाहरू निर्माण गरे। उनी सिंहासनमा आउने तरिका धेरै रोचक र एकै समयमा विवादास्पद छ। उनका बुबा जीवित हुँदा पनि उनलाई प्रशासनको अनुभव थियो। जब उनका पिता लक्ष्मी नरसिंहको पागलपन बढ्दै गयो, उनले आफ्ना पितालाई जेलमा हाले र उनी स्वयं कान्तिपुरमा बाबुको राज प्रतिनिधि (regent) का रूपमा शासन गरे।

उनी एक सक्षम प्रशासक थिए। उनको शासनकालमा कान्तिपुर निकै विकसित थियो। ल्हासा (तिब्बत) सँगको व्यापार पनि राम्रो चलिरहेको थियो। आफ्नो चलाखीले उनी ललितपुर र भक्तपुरका राजाहरूलाई एकअर्काको विरुद्ध लडाउने गर्थे। कहिले भक्तपुरको पक्षमा लागेर ललितपुरलाई धम्की दिन्थे। अन्य अवसरहरूमा, उनी ललितपुरसँग मिलेर भक्तपुरमाथि जाइलाग्थे।

प्रताप मल्ल धार्मिक स्वभावका व्यक्ति थिए। उनले गुह्येश्वरीमा सुन्दर मन्दिर बनाएर घेरा लगाए। उनले पशुपतिनाथको मन्दिरको जीर्णोद्धार गरे र त्यसमाथि गजुर (pinnacle) राखे। स्वयम्भूमा उनले प्रतापपुर, कवीन्द्रपुर र अन्य धेरै मन्दिरहरू बनाए र तामाको सुनौलो 'बज्र' पनि स्थापना गरे। उनले बासुकी भीमसेन, तलेजु र देगुतले मन्दिरहरूको पनि जीर्णोद्धार गरे। दुष्ट शक्तिहरूलाई भगाउने उद्देश्यले, उनले आफ्नो दरबारको ढोकाको छेउमा बाँदर देवता हनुमानको मूर्ति खडा गरे र दरबारलाई हनुमानढोका भने। उनले दरबारको सुनौलो ढोका खडा गरे, लायकु बहीमा नृसिंहा, कालभैरव र विश्वरूपको मूर्ति स्थापना गरे। दरबार भित्र उनले सुन्दरी चोक र मोहन चोक पनि स्थापना गरे। भण्डारखालमा पोखरी खनेर बुढानिलकण्ठबाट पानी ल्याएर भरियो। उनले पोखरीमा सुतेका नारायणको मूर्ति स्थापना गरे, जुन बुढानिलकण्ठ मन्दिरको हुबहु नक्कल थियो।
passage.contentEnglish:
Pratap Malla was one of the most famous kings of Malla Dynasty. He constructed some magnificent and beautiful architectural structure around Kathmandu. The way he came to the throne is very interesting and controversial at the same time. He had the experience of administration even when his father was alive. When his father Laxmi Nara Singh's madness grew worse, he imprisoned his father and he himself ruled as a regent of his father in Kantipur.

He was an able administrator. Kantipur was highly developed during his reign. Trade with Lhasa (Tibet) was also going on well. By his tact he was making the kings of Lalitpur and Bhaktapur play against each other. Sometimes he sided with Bhaktapur and posed a threat to Lalitpur. On other occasions, he aligned with Lalitpur and fell upon Bhaktapur.

Pratap Malla was a religious-minded person. He built a beautiful temple at Guhyeshwari and fenced it. He renovated the temple of Pashupatinath and raised a pinnacle over it. At Swayambhu he built Pratappur, Kabeendrapur and many other temples and also set up a copper gilt 'Bajra'. He also renovated the temples and Basuki Bhimsen, Taleju and Degutale. With a view to warding off evils, he erected an image of Hanuman, the monkey god, by the side of his palace gate and called the palace Hanumandhoka. He erected the golden gate of the palace, set up an image of Nri Simha, Kal Bhairab and Vishwaroop at Layaku Bahi. Inside the palace, he also set up Sundari Chowk and Mohan Chowk. A pond was dug at Bhandarkhal and filled with water brought from Budhanilkantha. He installed an image of Narayan lying in the pond, an exact replica from Budhanilkantha Temple.

subQuestions.questionNepali: प्रताप मल्लले काठमाडौँ उपत्यकामा सुन्दर __________ निर्माण गरे।
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Pratap Malla constructed beautiful __________ in the Kathmandu Valley.
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: वास्तुकला संरचनाहरू
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: architectural structures
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठको दोस्रो वाक्यमा भनिएको छ, "He constructed some magnificent and beautiful architectural structure around Kathmandu."
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The second sentence of the text states, "He constructed some magnificent and beautiful architectural structure around Kathmandu." 
Citation: Lesson 9.

subQuestions.questionNepali: आफ्नो बुबालाई __________ गरेपछि प्रताप मल्लले आफूलाई बुबाको राजप्रतिनिधि घोषणा गरे।
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Pratap Malla declared himself a regent of his father after he __________ his father.
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: कैद (imprisoned)
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: imprisoned
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठमा भनिएको छ, "...he imprisoned his father and he himself ruled as a regent..."
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The text states, "...he imprisoned his father and he himself ruled as a regent..." 
Citation: Lesson 9.

subQuestions.questionNepali: प्रताप मल्लको शासनकालमा, __________ एक उच्च विकसित राज्य थियो।
subQuestions.questionEnglish: During Pratap Malla's reign, __________ was a highly developed state.
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: कान्तिपुर
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: Kantipur
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठमा उल्लेख छ, "Kantipur was highly developed during his reign."
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The text mentions, "Kantipur was highly developed during his reign." 
Citation: Lesson 9.

subQuestions.questionNepali: पशुपतिनाथ मन्दिरको टुप्पोमा प्रताप मल्लले __________ उठाए (राखे)।
subQuestions.questionEnglish: On the top of Pashupatinath Temple Pratap Malla raised a/an __________.
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: शिखर (pinnacle)
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: pinnacle
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठमा भनिएको छ, "He renovated the temple of Pashupatinath and raised a pinnacle over it."
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The text states, "He renovated the temple of Pashupatinath and raised a pinnacle over it." 
Citation: Lesson 9.

subQuestions.questionNepali: __________ को छेउमा रहेको हनुमानको मूर्ति दुष्ट शक्तिहरूलाई भगाउन खडा गरिएको थियो।
subQuestions.questionEnglish: The image of Hanuman at the side of the __________ was erected to ward off evils.
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: दरबारको ढोका (palace gate)
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: palace gate
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठमा उल्लेख छ, "...he erected an image of Hanuman... by the side of his palace gate..."
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The text mentions, "...he erected an image of Hanuman... by the side of his palace gate..." 
Citation: Lesson 9.

subSections.titleNepali: पाठबाट सही जानकारी लिई खाली ठाउँहरू भर्नुहोस्।
subSections.titleEnglish: Fill in the gaps with the correct information from the text.

subQuestions.questionNepali: प्रताप मल्लले किन आफ्ना बुबालाई जेलमा हाले?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Why did Pratap Malla imprison his father?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: उनले आफ्नो बुबालाई कैद गरे किनभने उनका बुबाको पागलपन बढ्दै गएको थियो।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: He imprisoned his father because his father's madness grew worse.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठमा भनिएको छ, "When his father Laxmi Nara Singh's madness grew worse, he imprisoned his father..."
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The text states, "When his father Laxmi Nara Singh's madness grew worse, he imprisoned his father..." 
Citation: Lesson 9.

subQuestions.questionNepali: प्रताप मल्ल एक चलाख शासक थिए भनेर तपाईँ कसरी भन्न सक्नुहुन्छ?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: How can you say that Pratap Malla was a clever ruler?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: उनी चलाख थिए किनभने उनले ललितपुर र भक्तपुरका राजाहरूलाई कहिले एकको पक्ष लिएर त कहिले अर्कोको पक्ष लिएर एकअर्का विरुद्ध लडाउँथे।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: He was clever because he made the kings of Lalitpur and Bhaktapur play against each other by sometimes siding with one and sometimes with the other.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
उनले ललितपुर र भक्तपुरका राजाहरूलाई एकअर्काको विरुद्धमा खेलाएर नियन्त्रणमा राखेका थिए, कहिले एकातिर त कहिले अर्कोतिर लागेर।
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
He kept the kings of Lalitpur and Bhaktapur under control by making them play against each other, siding with one and then the other. 
Citation: Lesson 9.

subQuestions.questionNepali: प्रताप मल्लले किन धेरैजसो धार्मिक स्थलहरूको पुनर्निर्माण गरे?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Why did Pratap Malla renovate mostly the religious sites?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: धार्मिक स्वभावको व्यक्ति भएकाले उनले धार्मिक स्थलहरूको जीर्णोद्धार गरे।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: He renovated religious sites because he was a religious-minded person.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठले भन्छ, "Pratap Malla was a religious-minded person," र त्यसपछि उनले गरेका धेरै धार्मिक निर्माण र नवीकरणहरूको सूची दिन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The text describes him as a "religious-minded person," followed by a list of his religious constructions and renovations. 
Citation: Lesson 9.

subQuestions.questionNepali: प्रताप मल्लले भण्डारखालमा के बनाए?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: What did Pratap Malla build at Bhandarkhal?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: भण्डारखालमा, उनले पोखरी खने र बुढानीलकण्ठबाट ल्याएको पानीले भरे।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: At Bhandarkhal, he dug a pond and filled it with water brought from Budhanilakantha.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठमा उल्लेख छ, "A pond was dug at Bhandarkhal and filled with water brought from Budhanilkantha."
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The text mentions, "A pond was dug at Bhandarkhal and filled with water brought from Budhanilkantha." 
Citation: Lesson 9.

subQuestions.questionNepali: के तपाईँलाई लाग्छ कि मानिसहरू प्रताप मल्लको शासनकालमा खुसी थिए? कारण दिनुहोस्।
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Do you think people were happy with Pratap Malla's reign? Give a reason.
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: हो, मलाई लाग्छ मानिसहरू सम्भवतः खुसी थिए किनभने कान्तिपुर अत्यधिक विकसित थियो र उनको शासनकालमा व्यापार राम्रो भइरहेको थियो।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: Yes, I think people were likely happy because Kantipur was highly developed and trade was going well during his reign.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठले भन्छ, "Kantipur was highly developed during his reign" र "Trade with Lhasa (Tibet) was also going on well," जसले समृद्धिलाई सङ्केत गर्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The text states, "Kantipur was highly developed during his reign" and "Trade with Lhasa (Tibet) was also going on well," indicating prosperity. 
Citation: Lesson 9.

subSections.titleNepali: तलका प्रश्नहरूको पूर्ण वाक्यमा उत्तर दिनुहोस्।
subSections.titleEnglish: Answer the following questions in full sentences.

questions.titleNepali: पाठ पढ्नुहोस् र त्यसपछिका कार्यहरू गर्नुहोस्।
questions.titleEnglish: Read the text and do the tasks that follow.

passage.contentNepali:
भिडियो उत्पादनको लागि इच्छाको अभिव्यक्ति (Expression of Interest) आह्वान
चाइल्ड फन्ड जापान - नेपाल कार्यालय, ललितपुर, नेपालका लागि
सूचना प्रकाशन मिति: ०३ जनवरी, २०२५

चाइल्ड फन्ड जापान नेपाल अफिस (CFJNO) एक बाल-केन्द्रित अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय विकास संस्था हो जुन सौहार्दपूर्ण सहअस्तित्वको भावनामा अन्तर्राष्ट्रिय विकास सहयोग मार्फत बालबालिकाको अधिकार प्रवर्द्धन गर्न प्रतिबद्ध छ। चाइल्ड फन्ड जापान नेपाल अफिस ले भिडियो उत्पादन सेवाहरू प्रदान गर्न नेपालमा इच्छुक र योग्य बाह्य व्यक्तिगत परामर्शदाता वा परामर्शदाता कम्पनीहरूको खोजी गरिरहेको छ:
१. धादिङ र सिन्धुपाल्चोक जिल्लाहरूमा दिगो शैक्षिक विकासलाई अगाडि बढाउन उनीहरूको भूमिका प्रदर्शन गर्दै, प्रायोजन कार्यक्रमको परिवर्तनकारी प्रभावलाई अभिलेखीकरण गर्न र उपलब्धि तथा कोसेढुङ्गाहरू खिच्न, र
२. बागलुङ जिल्लामा बालबालिका, विद्यालय र समुदायमा बसाइँसराइको प्रभावलाई अभिलेखीकरण गर्न।

दुवै कार्यका लागि प्रस्तावहरू अङ्ग्रेजीमा लेखिएको हुनुपर्छ र एउटा मात्र आवेदन मार्फत बुझाउनुपर्छ। इच्छुक नेपाली फर्म/संस्थाहरू वा व्यक्तिहरूले आफ्नो इच्छाको अभिव्यक्ति (EOI) बुझाउन सक्छन्। कृपया आफ्नो EOI र आवश्यक कागजातहरू विद्युतीय माध्यमबाट info@childfund.org.np मा बुझाउनुहोला। म्याद सकिएपछि प्राप्त प्रस्ताव मूल्याङ्कनका लागि विचार गरिने छैन।

बुझाउने अन्तिम मिति: १२ जनवरी, २०२५, १७:०० बजे (नेपाली समय) भन्दा अगाडि

कुनै पनि प्रस्तावलाई कारण नखुलाई स्वीकृत वा अस्वीकृत गर्ने सम्पूर्ण अधिकार CFJNO मा सुरक्षित छ। आवश्यक परेमा, आवेदकहरूलाई स्वीकृति हुनु अघि आवेदन/प्रस्तावको परिमार्जन र प्रस्तुतीकरणका लागि सोधिनेछ।
passage.contentEnglish:
Call for Expression of Interest for Video Production for Child Fund Japan - Nepal Office, Lalitpur, Nepal
Notice Publication date: 03 Janaury, 2025

Child Fund Japan Nepal Office (CFJNO) is a child-focused international development organization committed to promoting the rights of children through international development cooperation in the spirit of harmonious coexistence. Child Fund Japan Nepal Office is seeking interested and eligible External Individual Consultants or Consulting Firms in Nepal to provide video production services:
1. to document the transformative impact and capture the achievement and milestones of the sponsorship programme, showcasing their role in driving sustainable educational development in Dhading and Sindhupalchowk districts and,
2. documenting the impact of migration on children, schools and community in Baglung district.

The proposals for both assignments must be written in English and submitted through a single application. Interested Nepali firms/organizations or individuals can submit their Expression of Interest (EOI). Please submit your EOI and the required documents electronically to info@childfund.org.np. The proposal received after the deadline will not be considered for evaluation.

Deadline for submission: 12 January, 2025 before 17:00 hours Nepal Time

All rights are reserved with CFJNO either to approve or disapprove any proposal without giving reasons whatsoever. If needed, the applicants will be asked for modifications and presentations of the application/proposal before approval.
passage.titleNepali: भिडियो उत्पादनका लागि आशय पत्र आह्वान

subSections.titleNepali: तलका प्रश्नहरूको पूर्ण वाक्यमा उत्तर दिनुहोस्।
subSections.titleEnglish: Answer the following questions in full sentences.

questions.titleNepali: पाठ पढ्नुहोस् र त्यसपछिका कार्यहरू गर्नुहोस्।
questions.titleEnglish: Read the text and do the tasks that follow.

passage.contentNepali:
नोबेल पुरस्कार भनेको स्विडिश आविष्कारक र उद्योगपति अल्फ्रेड नोबेलद्वारा त्यस उद्देश्यका लागि इच्छापत्रद्वारा सुम्पिएको कोषबाट वार्षिक रूपमा प्रदान गरिने पुरस्कारहरू (१९६९ सम्म पाँचवटा, जब छैटौं थपियो) मध्ये कुनै पनि हो। नोबेल पुरस्कारहरू बौद्धिक उपलब्धिका लागि विश्वको सबैभन्दा प्रतिष्ठित पुरस्कार मानिन्छन्।

१८९५ मा मस्यौदा गरिएको आफ्नो इच्छापत्र (will) मा, नोबेलले निर्देशन दिएका थिए कि उनको सम्पत्तिको अधिकांश हिस्सा "पछिल्लो वर्षमा, मानवजातिलाई सबैभन्दा ठूलो फाइदा पुर्याउनेहरूलाई" पाँच वार्षिक पुरस्कार प्रदान गर्न कोषको रूपमा छुट्याइयोस्। उनको इच्छापत्र अनुसार स्थापित यी पुरस्कारहरू क्रमशः भौतिकशास्त्र, रसायनशास्त्र, शरीर विज्ञान वा चिकित्सा, साहित्य र शान्तिका लागि नोबेल पुरस्कार हुन्।

पुरस्कारहरूको पहिलो वितरण १० डिसेम्बर, १९०१ मा, नोबेलको मृत्युको पाँचौं वार्षिकोत्सवमा भएको थियो। अल्फ्रेड नोबेलको सम्झनामा आर्थिक विज्ञानमा एक अतिरिक्त पुरस्कार १९६८ मा बैंक अफ स्वीडेनद्वारा स्थापना गरिएको थियो र पहिलो पटक १९६९ मा प्रदान गरिएको थियो। यद्यपि प्राविधिक रूपमा नोबेल पुरस्कार होइन, यो पुरस्कारसँगै पहिचान गरिन्छ; यसका विजेताहरू नोबेल पुरस्कार प्राप्तकर्ताहरूसँगै घोषणा गरिन्छन् र आर्थिक विज्ञान पुरस्कार नोबेल पुरस्कार वितरण समारोहमा प्रस्तुत गरिन्छ।

नोबेलको मृत्युपछि, उनको इच्छापत्रका प्रावधानहरू कार्यान्वयन गर्न र उनको कोषको व्यवस्थापन गर्न नोबेल फाउन्डेसन स्थापना गरिएको थियो। आफ्नो इच्छापत्रमा, उनले तोकेका थिए कि चार फरक संस्थाहरू, तीन स्वीडिश र एक नर्वेजियनले पुरस्कार प्रदान गर्नुपर्छ। स्टकहोमबाट, रोयल स्वीडिश एकेडेमी अफ साइन्सेजले भौतिकशास्त्र, रसायनशास्त्र र आर्थिक विज्ञानका लागि पुरस्कार प्रदान गर्दछ, कारोलिन्स्का इन्स्टिच्युटले शरीरविज्ञान वा चिकित्साका लागि पुरस्कार प्रदान गर्दछ, र स्वीडिश एकेडेमीले साहित्यका लागि पुरस्कार प्रदान गर्दछ। ओस्लो, नर्वेमा आधारित नर्वेजियन नोबेल समितिले शान्तिका लागि पुरस्कार प्रदान गर्दछ। नोबेल फाउन्डेसन कोषको कानूनी मालिक र कार्यात्मक प्रशासक हो र पुरस्कार प्रदान गर्ने संस्थाहरूको संयुक्त प्रशासनिक निकायको रूपमा काम गर्दछ, तर यो पुरस्कार छलफल वा निर्णयहरूसँग सम्बन्धित छैन।
passage.contentEnglish:
Nobel Prize is any of the prizes (five in number until 1969, when a sixth was added) awarded annually from a fund bequeathed for that purpose by the Swedish inventor and industrialist Alfred Nobel. The Nobel Prizes are widely regarded as the world's most prestigious awards for intellectual achievement.

In his will drafted in 1895, Nobel instructed that most of his fortune be set aside as a fund for the awarding of five annual prizes "to those who, during the preceding year, shall have conferred the greatest benefit on mankind?" These prizes as established by his will are the Nobel Prize for Physics, Chemistry, Physiology or Medicine, Literature and Peace respectively.

The first distribution of the prizes took place on December 10, 1901, the fifth anniversary of Nobel's death. An additional award, in Economic Sciences in memory of Alfred Nobel, was established in 1968 by the Bank of Sweden and was first awarded in 1969. Although not technically a Nobel Prize, it is identified with the award; its winners are announced with the Nobel Prize recipients and the Prize in Economic Sciences is presented at the Nobel Prize Award Ceremony.

After Nobel's death, the Nobel Foundation was set up to carry out the provisions of his will and to administer his funds. In his will, he had stipulated that four different institutions three Swedish and one Norwegian should award the prizes. From Stockholm, the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences confers the prizes for Physics, Chemistry and Economic Sciences, the Karolinska Institute confers the prize for Physiology or Medicine, and the Swedish Academy confers the prize for Literature. The Norwegian Nobel Committee based on Oslo, Norway confers the prize for peace. The Nobel Foundation is the legal owner and functional administrator of the funds and serves as the joint administrative body of the price awarding institutions, but it is not concerned with prize deliberations or decisions.

subQuestions.questionNepali: उनको उत्कृष्ट योगदानको लागि उनलाई मानार्थ उपाधि __________ गरियो।
subQuestions.questionEnglish: An honorary degree was __________ to her for her outstanding contribution.
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: प्रदान गरियो (conferred)
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: conferred
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठबाट 'conferred' शब्द (प्रदान गरियो) यहाँ उपयुक्त हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The word 'conferred' from the text fits here, meaning granted or bestowed. 
Citation: Lesson 15.

subQuestions.questionNepali: राजेशका बुबाले उनलाई सम्पत्ति मात्र होइन, निष्ठा र कडा परिश्रमको __________ पनि दिए।
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Rajesh's father __________ him not only a fortune but also a legacy of integrity and hard work.
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: इच्छापत्रद्वारा दिए/सुम्पिए (bequeathed)
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: bequeathed
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठबाट 'bequeathed' शब्द (वसीयतमा दिनु) यहाँ उपयुक्त हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The word 'bequeathed' from the text fits here, meaning left by will. 
Citation: Lesson 15.

subQuestions.questionNepali: काउन्सिलको __________ सहरको बढ्दो ट्राफिक समस्याहरूलाई कसरी सम्बोधन गर्ने भन्ने कुरामा केन्द्रित थियो।
subQuestions.questionEnglish: The council's __________ focused on how to address the city's growing traffic issues.
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: छलफल/विचार विमर्श (deliberations)
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: deliberations
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठबाट 'deliberations' शब्द (छलफल/विचार विमर्श) यहाँ उपयुक्त हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The word 'deliberations' from the text fits here, referring to detailed discussions. 
Citation: Lesson 15.

subQuestions.questionNepali: सबैलाई गुणस्तरीय शिक्षा सुनिश्चित गर्न विद्यालय विगत केही वर्षदेखि अनवरत रूपमा __________ काम गरिरहेको छ।
subQuestions.questionEnglish: To ensure quality education to all the school has been __________ working tirelessly for the last few years.
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: प्राविधिक रूपमा (technically)
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: technically
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
सन्दर्भ अनुसार यहाँ 'technically' शब्द प्रयोग गर्न सकिन्छ, यद्यपि यो पाठमा 'technically a Nobel Prize' को सन्दर्भमा छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
Based on the options from the text, 'technically' fits the grammatical structure, though contextually slightly different. 
Citation: Lesson 15.

subQuestions.questionNepali: शिक्षकले नयाँ सुरु गर्नु अघि सबै विद्यार्थीहरूलाई __________ को सम्झना गराए।
subQuestions.questionEnglish: The teacher reminded all the students of the __________ before starting a new one.
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: प्रावधानहरू (provisions)
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: provisions
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
यहाँ 'provisions' (नियम/प्रावधान) शब्द उपयुक्त हुन सक्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The word 'provisions' fits here, referring to conditions or rules. 
Citation: Lesson 15.

subSections.titleNepali: पाठमा रेखांकित सही शब्दहरू प्रयोग गरी खाली ठाउँहरू भर्नुहोस्।
subSections.titleEnglish: Fill in the gaps with the correct words underlined in the text.

sentences.textNepali: नोबेल शान्ति पुरस्कार नर्वेमा प्रदान गरिन्छ।
sentences.textEnglish: Nobel Prize for Peace is granted in Norway.

sentences.textNepali: नोबेल पुरस्कारहरू पहिलो पटक २० औं शताब्दीको सुरुमा वितरण गरियो।
sentences.textEnglish: The Nobel Prizes firstly distributed at the beginning of the 20th century.

sentences.textNepali: मानवजातिका लागि योगदान पुर्याउनेहरूलाई हरेक वर्ष नोबेल पुरस्कार प्रदान गरिन्छ।
sentences.textEnglish: Nobel Prizes are awarded every year to those who have contributed for mankind.

sentences.textNepali: नोबेल फाउन्डेसनले पुरस्कारसँग सम्बन्धित प्रावधानहरू व्यवस्थापन गर्छ।
sentences.textEnglish: The Nobel foundation manages the provisions related to the prizes.

sentences.textNepali: बैंक अफ स्वीडेनले अर्थशास्त्रका लागि पुरस्कार स्थापना गर्यो।
sentences.textEnglish: Bank of Sweden established the prize for Economic Sciences.

subSections.explanationNepali:
वाक्यहरूलाई पाठमा जानकारीको प्रवाह अनुसार क्रमबद्ध गरिएको छ: पुरस्कारको उद्देश्य, पहिलो वितरण, अर्थशास्त्र पुरस्कारको स्थापना, नोबेल फाउन्डेशनको भूमिका, र विशिष्ट पुरस्कार वितरण गर्ने संस्थाहरू।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
subSections.explanationEnglish:
The sentences are ordered according to the flow of information in the text: purpose of the prize, first distribution, establishment of the Economics prize, role of the Nobel Foundation, and specific awarding bodies. 
Citation: Lesson 15.
subSections.titleNepali: तलका वाक्यहरूलाई पाठमा आएअनुसार सही क्रममा राख्नुहोस्।
subSections.titleEnglish: Put the following sentences in the correct order as they appear in the text.

subQuestions.questionNepali: अल्फ्रेड नोबेल को थिए?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Who was Alfred Nobel?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: अल्फ्रेड नोबेल स्विडेनी आविष्कारक र उद्योगपति थिए।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: Alfred Nobel was a Swedish inventor and industrialist.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पहिलो अनुच्छेदले उनलाई "Swedish inventor and industrialist" भनेर चिनाउँछ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The first paragraph identifies him as a "Swedish inventor and industrialist." 
Citation: Lesson 15.

subQuestions.questionNepali: सन् १८९५ मा तयार पारिएको नोबेलको वसीयतका आधारमा कुन पुरस्कारहरू स्थापना गरिएका थिए?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: What prizes were established based on Nobel's will, drafted in 1895?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: भौतिकशास्त्र, रसायनशास्त्र, शरीर विज्ञान वा चिकित्सा, साहित्य र शान्तिका पुरस्कारहरू उनको इच्छापत्रमा आधारित भएर स्थापना गरिएका थिए।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: The prizes for Physics, Chemistry, Physiology or Medicine, Literature, and Peace were established based on his will.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठले १९८५ को इच्छापत्र अनुसार स्थापित पाँच पुरस्कारहरू सूचीबद्ध गर्दछ: भौतिकशास्त्र, रसायनशास्त्र, चिकित्सा, साहित्य र शान्ति।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The text lists the five prizes established by his 1895 will: Physics, Chemistry, Physiology or Medicine, Literature, and Peace. 
Citation: Lesson 15.

subQuestions.questionNepali: नोबेल पुरस्कारहरूमध्ये सबैभन्दा कान्छो कुन हो?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Which is the youngest among Nobel Prizes?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: आर्थिक विज्ञानमा पुरस्कार सबैभन्दा कान्छो हो, जुन १९६८ मा स्थापित भयो।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: The Prize in Economic Sciences is the youngest, established in 1968.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठले बताउँछ कि अर्थशास्त्रको पुरस्कार १९६८ मा स्थापना गरिएको थियो, जुन अन्य भन्दा धेरै पछि हो।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The text states the Economic Sciences prize was established in 1968, making it the newest. 
Citation: Lesson 15.

subQuestions.questionNepali: नोबेलको वसीयत अनुसार, कतिवटा संस्थाहरूले पुरस्कार प्रदान गर्नुपर्छ?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: As per Nobel's will, how many institutions should award the prizes?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: चार फरक संस्थाहरू (तीन स्विडेनी र एक नर्वेली) ले पुरस्कार प्रदान गर्नुपर्छ।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: Four different institutions (three Swedish and one Norwegian) should award the prizes.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठमा भनिएको छ, "four different institutions three Swedish and one Norwegian should award the prizes."
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The text says, "four different institutions three Swedish and one Norwegian should award the prizes." 
Citation: Lesson 15.

subQuestions.questionNepali: साहित्यका लागि नोबेल पुरस्कार कुन संस्थाले वितरण गर्छ?
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Which organization distributes the Nobel Prize for literature?
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: स्विडेनी एकेडेमीले साहित्यको लागि पुरस्कार प्रदान गर्दछ।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: The Swedish Academy confers the prize for Literature.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
पाठमा उल्लेख छ, "the Swedish Academy confers the prize for Literature."
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
The text mentions, "the Swedish Academy confers the prize for Literature." 
Citation: Lesson 15.

subSections.titleNepali: तलका प्रश्नहरूको पूर्ण वाक्यमा उत्तर दिनुहोस्।
subSections.titleEnglish: Answer the following questions in full sentences.

questions.titleNepali: तलको पाठ पढ्नुहोस् र त्यसपछिका कार्यहरू गर्नुहोस्।
questions.titleEnglish: Read the following text and do the tasks that follow.

sampleAnswer.explanationNepali:
यो उत्तरले विद्यालयमा अभिभावक दिवसको बारेमा जानकारी दिने सूचनाको ढाँचामा छ। यसले मिति, समय, स्थान, प्रमुख अतिथि, र कार्यक्रमका मुख्य आकर्षणहरू (पुरस्कार वितरण) समावेश गर्दछ।
उद्धरण: पाठ २
sampleAnswer.explanationEnglish:
This answer is in the format of a notice informing about the Parents Day celebration. It includes the date, time, venue, chief guest, and main attractions (prize distribution). 
Citation: Lesson 2.
sampleAnswer.contentNepali:
आदर्श माध्यमिक विद्यालय
काठमाडौँ

मिति: २१ असार, २०८२

सूचना

यो सम्पूर्ण विद्यार्थी, कर्मचारी र अभिभावकहरूलाई जानकारी गराइन्छ कि हाम्रो विद्यालयले २१ असार, २०८२ (१० जुलाई, २०२५) मा वार्षिक 'अभिभावक दिवस' मनाउँदैछ। कार्यक्रम विद्यालय परिसरमा बिहान ११:०० बजेबाट सुरु हुनेछ।

वडा अध्यक्षज्यूले यस अवसरमा प्रमुख अतिथिको रूपमा उपस्थित हुन सहमति जनाउनुभएको छ। कार्यक्रममा विद्यार्थीहरूको सांस्कृतिक प्रस्तुतिहरू र वर्षभरि सञ्चालित खेलकुद तथा अन्य अतिरिक्त क्रियाकलापका विजेताहरूलाई पुरस्कार वितरण गरिनेछ।

सम्पूर्ण विद्यार्थी तथा कर्मचारीहरूलाई समयमै कार्यक्रममा उपस्थित हुन अनुरोध गरिन्छ। अभिभावकज्यूहरूलाई यस अवसरमा उपस्थित भई शोभा बढाइदिनुहुन हार्दिक निमन्त्रणा गरिन्छ।

(प्रधानाध्यापक)
आदर्श माध्यमिक विद्यालय
sampleAnswer.contentEnglish:
Adarsha Secondary School
Kathmandu

Date: July 1, 2025

NOTICE

This is to inform all students, staff, and parents that our school is organizing the annual 'Parents Day' celebration on July 10, 2025. The program will be held at the school premises starting from 11:00 AM.

The Ward Chairperson has kindly consented to be the Chief Guest for the occasion. The event will include cultural performances by students and the distribution of awards and prizes to the winners of sports and other extra-curricular activities held throughout the year.

All students and staff are requested to attend the function on time. Parents are cordially invited to grace the occasion.

(Head Teacher)
Adarsha Secondary School

questions.titleNepali: तपाईंको विद्यालयले जुलाई १० मा अभिभावक दिवस आयोजना गर्दैछ। दिनिएका संकेतहरू प्रयोग गरी आफ्नो प्रधानाध्यापकको तर्फबाट करिब १०० शब्दमा सूचना लेख्नुहोस्।
questions.titleEnglish: Your school is going to organize Parents Day on July 10. Write a notice in about 100 words on behalf of your Head teacher using the given clues.
cluesNepali: खेलकुद र अन्य क्रियाकलापका विजेताहरूका लागि पुरस्कारहरू
cluesEnglish: awards and prizes for winners of sports and other activities

sampleAnswer.explanationNepali:
यो उत्तरले दिइएको संकेतहरू प्रयोग गरेर चार गाई र सिंहको कथा विकास गर्दछ। यसले कसरी एकताले उनीहरूलाई सुरक्षित राख्यो र कसरी फूटले उनीहरूको विनाश निम्त्यायो भन्ने देखाउँछ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ११
sampleAnswer.explanationEnglish:
This answer develops the story of four cows and a lion using the provided clues. It shows how unity kept them safe and how division led to their destruction. 
Citation: Lesson 11.
sampleAnswer.contentNepali:
एकादेशमा, एउटा घना जंगलमा चारवटा गाई बस्थे। तिनीहरू धेरै घनिष्ठ साथीहरू थिए र सबै काम सँगै गर्थे। जब तिनीहरू चर्ने गर्थे, सँगै बस्थे। तिनीहरूको एकताका कारण, कुनै पनि शिकारी, सिंहले समेत, तिनीहरूलाई आक्रमण गर्ने आँट गर्दैनथ्यो। सिंहले तिनीहरूलाई खान चाहन्थ्यो तर थाहा थियो कि उसले ती सबैजनासँग एकै पटक लड्न सक्दैन। त्यसैले, उसले एउटा धूर्त योजना सोच्यो। उसले अन्य जनावरहरूको मद्दतले एउटा गाईको बारेमा अर्कोलाई हल्ला फैलायो। बिस्तारै, गाईहरू एक अर्कालाई शंका गर्न थाले र झगडा गरे। अन्ततः तिनीहरू अलग भए र विभिन्न दिशाहरूमा गए। यो मौका छोपेर, सिंहले तिनीहरूलाई एक-एक गरेर आक्रमण गर्यो र ती सबैलाई मारिदियो।

नैतिक शिक्षा: एकतामा बल हुन्छ, विभाजन नै कमजोरी हो।
sampleAnswer.contentEnglish:
Once upon a time, four cows lived in a dense jungle. They were very close friends and did everything together. Whenever they grazed, they stayed together. Because of their unity, no predator, not even the lion, dared to attack them. The lion wanted to eat them but knew he couldn't fight them all at once. So, he thought of a cunning plan. He spread rumours about one cow to another with the help of other animals. Slowly, the cows started doubting each other and quarreled. They eventually separated and went in different directions. Taking this opportunity, the lion attacked them one by one and killed them all.

Moral: Unity is strength, division is weakness.

questions.titleNepali: दिइएका संकेतहरूको मद्दतले करिब १०० शब्दमा पढ्न सकिने कथा तयार गर्नुहोस्। उपयुक्त शीर्षक र नैतिकता पनि दिनुहोस्।
questions.titleEnglish: Develop a readable story in about 100 words with the help of the given clues. Also supply a suitable title and a moral.
cluesNepali: एउटा सिंहले आक्रमण गर्ने योजना बनाउँछ
तिनीहरू बीच प्रतिस्पर्धा सिर्जना गर्न सक्षम
cluesEnglish: a lion makes a plan to attack
spreads rumours with the help of other animals
able to create a rivalry among them

sampleAnswer.explanationNepali:
यो उत्तरले दुई साथीहरू, सलिना र रवि, बीचको कुराकानी प्रस्तुत गर्दछ जसले स्कूल पिकनिकको योजना बनाइरहेका छन्। उनीहरूले स्थान, बजेट, र गतिविधिहरूको बारेमा छलफल गर्छन्।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sampleAnswer.explanationEnglish:
This answer presents a conversation between two friends, Salina and Rabi, planning a school picnic. They discuss the location, budget, and logistics. 
Citation: Lesson 5.
sampleAnswer.contentNepali:
सलिना: नमस्ते रवि! के तिमीले अर्को महिना हुने हाम्रो कक्षा पिकनिकको बारेमा सुन्यौ? हामीले योजना बनाउन सुरु गर्नुपर्छ।

रवि: नमस्ते सलिना! हो, मैले सुनें। म साँच्चै उत्साहित छु। यस पटक हामी कहाँ जानुपर्छ जस्तो लाग्छ?

सलिना: म गोदावरीको बारेमा सोच्दै थिएँ। यो सुन्दर छ र खेलका लागि प्रशस्त खुला ठाउँ छ। तिम्रो के भनाइ छ?

रवि: गोदावरी राम्रो छ, तर हामी त्यहाँ दुई वर्ष अघि गएका थियौं। चन्द्रागिरी हिल्स कस्तो हुन्छ? केबलकारको सवारी सबैका लागि रमाइलो हुनेछ।

सलिना: त्यो त गज्जबको विचार हो! तर यो केही विद्यार्थीहरूको लागि अलि महँगो हुन सक्छ। हामीले बजेट जाँच गर्नुपर्छ।

रवि: सहि हो। हामी कक्षा शिक्षकलाई बजेटको बारेमा सोध्न सक्छौं। साथै, हामीले खाना र सङ्गीतको पनि व्यवस्था गर्नुपर्छ।

सलिना: पक्कै पनि। हामीलाई चाहिने चीजहरू र सम्भावित लागतहरूको सूची बनाऔं, त्यसपछि हामी कक्षामा दुबै विकल्पहरू प्रस्तुत गर्न सक्छौं।

रवि: योजना राम्रो छ। म भोलि यातायात खर्चको बारेमा सोध्नेछु।
sampleAnswer.contentEnglish:
Salina: Hi Rabi! Have you heard about our class picnic next month? We need to start planning.

Rabi: Hello Salina! Yes, I heard. I'm really excited. Where do you think we should go this time?

Salina: I was thinking about Godawari. It's beautiful and has plenty of open space for games. What do you say?

Rabi: Godawari is nice, but we went there two years ago. How about Chandragiri Hills? The cable car ride would be fun for everyone.

Salina: That's a great idea! But it might be a bit expensive for some students. We need to check the budget.

Rabi: True. We can ask the class teacher about the budget. Also, we should organize some food and music.

Salina: Definitely. Let's make a list of things we need and potential costs, then we can present both options to the class.

Rabi: Sounds like a plan. I'll ask about the transportation costs tomorrow.

questions.titleNepali: सलिना र रवि आदर्श माध्यमिक विद्यालयका दुई विद्यार्थी हुन्। उनीहरू विद्यालयको वनभोज जाने योजना बनाउँदैछन्। उनीहरू बीचको कुराकानी कम्तिमा छ पटक दोहोरो संवाद हुने गरी करिब १५० शब्दमा लेख्नुहोस्।
questions.titleEnglish: Salina and Rabi are two students of Adarsha Secondary School. They are planning for a school picnic. Write a conversation between them in not less than six exchanges in about 150 words.

sampleAnswer.explanationNepali:
यो उत्तरले विदेशमा रहेका दाइले बहिनीलाई अंग्रेजी सुधार्ने तरिकाहरू सुझाउँदै लेखेको पत्र हो। यसले सुन्ने, पढ्ने, बोल्ने र लेख्ने अभ्यासहरूमा जोड दिन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १३
sampleAnswer.explanationEnglish:
This answer is a letter from a brother abroad to his sister, suggesting ways to improve English. It emphasizes listening, reading, speaking, and writing practices. 
Citation: Lesson 13.
sampleAnswer.contentNepali:
सिड्नी, अष्ट्रेलिया
२० मार्च २०२५

प्यारी बहिनी,

म आशा गर्छु कि यो पत्रले तिमीलाई सुस्वास्थ्य र उच्च मनोबलमा भेट्नेछ। तिम्रो पत्र प्राप्त गरेर र तिमी आफ्नो अङ्ग्रेजी सुधार गर्न इच्छुक छौ भन्ने थाहा पाएर म धेरै खुसी भएँ। म यहाँ अङ्ग्रेजी भाषी वातावरणमा अध्ययन गरिरहेको हुनाले, म पक्कै पनि मलाई मद्दत गरेका केही सुझावहरू साझा गर्न सक्छु।

सबैभन्दा पहिले र मुख्य कुरा, भाषामा डुब्नु (immersion) नै मुख्य कुरा हो। सकेसम्म धेरै भाषाको घेरामा बस्ने प्रयास गर। तिमीले अङ्ग्रेजी चलचित्रहरू हेरेर, अङ्ग्रेजी गीतहरू सुनेर, वा आफूलाई मन पर्ने विषयहरूमा पोडकास्टहरू सुनेर यसो गर्न सक्छौ। यसले सुन्ने क्षमता र उच्चारणमा मद्दत गर्छ।

दोस्रो, पढाइ अविश्वसनीय रूपमा लाभदायक छ। साधारण कथाका किताबहरू वा पत्रिकाहरूबाट सुरु गर र बिस्तारै उपन्यासहरूतर्फ बढ। यसले तिम्रो शब्दावली बढाउनेछ र वाक्य संरचनाहरू बुझ्न मद्दत गर्नेछ। गल्ती गरे पनि बोल्न नडराऊ। आफ्ना साथीहरूसँग वा ऐनाको अगाडि उभिएर बोल्ने अभ्यास गर।

अन्त्यमा, हरेक दिन अङ्ग्रेजीमा दैनिकी लेख्नु राम्रो बानी हो। यसले तिमीलाई अङ्ग्रेजीमा सोच्न बाध्य पार्छ। निरन्तरता नै रहस्य हो। अभ्यास गर्न हरेक दिन कम्तिमा ३० मिनेट छुट्टयाऊ।

म पक्का छु कि तिम्रो लगनशीलताले, तिमीले छिट्टै भाषामा पोख्त हुनेछौ। कडा परिश्रम गरिरह!

मायाका साथ,
तिम्रो दाइ,
सुरेन
sampleAnswer.contentEnglish:
Sydney, Australia
20th March 2025

Dear Sister,

I hope this letter finds you in good health and high spirits. I was delighted to receive your letter and to know that you are keen on improving your English. Since I am studying here in an English-speaking environment, I can definitely share some tips that have helped me.

First and foremost, immersion is key. Try to surround yourself with the language as much as possible. You can do this by watching English movies, listening to English songs, or even listening to podcasts on topics you enjoy. This helps with listening skills and pronunciation.

Secondly, reading is incredibly beneficial. Start with simple storybooks or newspapers and gradually move to novels. This will expand your vocabulary and help you understand sentence structures. Don't be afraid to speak, even if you make mistakes. Practice speaking with your friends or even in front of a mirror.

Finally, writing a diary in English every day is a great habit. It forces you to think in English. Consistency is the secret. Dedicate at least 30 minutes every day to practice.

I am sure with your dedication, you will master the language in no time. Keep working hard!

With love,
Your brother,
Suren

questions.titleNepali: तपाईं विदेशमा अंग्रेजी अध्ययन गर्दै हुनुहुन्छ। नेपालमा रहेकी तपाईंकी बहिनीले तपाईंलाई उनको अंग्रेजी कसरी सुधार गर्न सकिन्छ भनेर सोधेकी छिन्। उनलाई अंग्रेजी सिक्ने प्रभावकारी तरिकाहरू सुझाउँदै करिब २०० शब्दमा चिठी लेख्नुहोस्।
questions.titleEnglish: You are studying English abroad. Your sister in Nepal has asked you how she can improve her English. Write a letter to her in about 200 words suggesting the effective ways for learning English.

subQuestions.questionNepali: Everything is all right, __________? (सही question tag थप्नुहोस्।)
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Everything is all right, __________? (Add a correct question tag.)
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: सबै ठीक छ, होइन त?
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: Everything is all right, isn't it?
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
'Everything' जस्ता अनिश्चित सर्वनामहरूको लागि ट्यागमा 'it' प्रयोग गरिन्छ। वाक्य सकारात्मक भएकोले ट्याग नकारात्मक हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १४
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
For indefinite pronouns like 'Everything', 'it' is used in the tag. Since the statement is positive, the tag is negative. 
Citation: Lesson 14.

subQuestions.questionNepali: Chadani likes ice cream. (नकारात्मकमा बदल्नुहोस्।)
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Chadani likes ice cream. (Change into negative.)
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: चाँदनीलाई आइसक्रिम मन पर्दैन।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: Chadani does not like ice cream.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
साधारण वर्तमान काल (likes - v5) लाई नकारात्मक बनाउन 'does not' + v1 (like) को प्रयोग गरिन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ११
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
To make the simple present tense (likes - v5) negative, 'does not' + v1 (like) is used. 
Citation: Lesson 11.

subQuestions.questionNepali: The competitors painted the picture beautifully. ('How' प्रयोग गरी प्रश्नमा बदल्नुहोस्।)
subQuestions.questionEnglish: The competitors painted the picture beautifully. (Change into 'How' question.)
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: प्रतियोगीहरूले कसरी चित्र पेन्ट गरे?
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: How did the competitors paint the picture?
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
'beautifully' (adverb of manner) बारे प्रश्न सोध्न 'How' को प्रयोग गरिन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १८
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
To ask about 'beautifully' (adverb of manner), 'How' is used. 
Citation: Lesson 18.

subQuestions.questionNepali: The municipality __________ (repair) road by the end of this month. (वाक्य पूरा गर्न कोष्ठकमा रहेको 'repair' क्रियाको सही रूप प्रयोग गर्नुहोस्।)
subQuestions.questionEnglish: The municipality __________ (repair) road by the end of this month. (Use the correct form of the verb 'repair' in the brackets to complete the sentence.)
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: यो महिनाको अन्त्यसम्ममा नगरपालिकाले बाटो मर्मत गरिसक्नेछ।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: The municipality will have repaired the road by the end of this month.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
'by the end of this month' ले भविष्यको एक समयसीमा जनाउँछ, त्यसैले Future Perfect Tense (will have repaired) उपयुक्त हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
'by the end of this month' indicates a deadline in the future, so the Future Perfect Tense (will have repaired) is appropriate. 
Citation: Lesson 12.

subQuestions.questionNepali: Sunaina said, "I'm knitting a sweater now." (अप्रत्यक्ष कथन (indirect speech) मा बदल्नुहोस्।)
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Sunaina said, "I'm knitting a sweater now." (Change into indirect speech.)
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: सुनैनाले भनिन् कि उनी त्यसबेला स्विटर बुन्दै थिइन्।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: Sunaina said that she was knitting a sweater then.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
Indirect speech मा, 'I' -> 'she', 'am' -> 'was', र 'now' -> 'then' मा परिवर्तन हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ २
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
In indirect speech, 'I' changes to 'she', 'am' changes to 'was', and 'now' changes to 'then'. 
Citation: Lesson 2.

subQuestions.questionNepali: Kumari threw the garbage into the container. (कर्मवाच्य (passive voice) मा बदल्नुहोस्।)
subQuestions.questionEnglish: Kumari threw the garbage into the container. (Change into passive voice.)
subQuestions.correctAnswerNepali: कुमारीद्वारा फोहोर कन्टेनरमा फालियो।
subQuestions.correctAnswerEnglish: The garbage was thrown into the container by Kumari.
subQuestions.explanationNepali:
भूतकालको वाक्य (threw - v2) लाई passive मा लैजाँदा 'was/were + v3' (was thrown) को प्रयोग हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ८
subQuestions.explanationEnglish:
When changing a past tense sentence (threw - v2) to passive, 'was/were + v3' (was thrown) is used. 
Citation: Lesson 8.

questions.titleNepali: कोष्ठकमा संकेत गरे बमोजिम तलका वाक्यहरू पुनः लेख्नुहोस्।
questions.titleEnglish: Reproduce the following sentences as indicated in the brackets.

questions.passage: Chitwan National Park is one of the most popular tourist destinations in Nepal known for its rich biodiversity. It is (a) _____ (a/an/the/no article) UNESCO World Heritage Site. The Park (b) _____ (is established/established/has been established/was established) in 1973. It is a home to rare species of animals and birds, (c) _____ (isn't it/aren't they/hasn't it/haven't they)? Visitors are often amazed by the sight of one horned rhinos bathing (d) _____ (at/by/on/in) the Narayani River. The guides (e) _____ (whom/which/who/whose) are highly trained provide detailed information to the visitors. Visitors who want to have the full experience (f) _____ (should/could/would/might) book a jungle safari in advance. If the park (g) _____ (is not protected/was not protected/had not been protected/will not be protected), these species might face extinction. The park authorities make the visitors (h) _____ (following/follow/to follow/followed) strict rules to ensure the park's safety. Tourists often ask, "(i) _____ (Why is the Park famous/Why the park is famous/Why was the Park famous/Why the Park had been famous)?" The guides explain that it is famous for its natural beauty and wildlife. Visitors enjoy activities such as jungle safaris and canoe rides. (j) _____ (However/Therefore/Because/Although), they return with unforgettable memories.

gaps.explanationNepali:
'UNESCO' को उच्चारण 'yu' (consonant sound) बाट सुरु हुन्छ, त्यसैले 'a' प्रयोग गरिन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ७
gaps.explanationEnglish:
'UNESCO' starts with a consonant sound 'yu', so 'a' is used. 
Citation: Lesson 7.

gaps.explanationNepali:
सन् १९७३ मा स्थापना भएको (भूतकालको निश्चित समय), त्यसैले simple past passive प्रयोग गरिन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
gaps.explanationEnglish:
It was established in 1973 (a specific past time), so simple past passive is used. 
Citation: Lesson 10.

gaps.explanationNepali:
वाक्य 'It is a home...' सकारात्मक छ, त्यसैले ट्याग 'isn't it' हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १४
gaps.explanationEnglish:
The statement 'It is a home...' is positive, so the tag is 'isn't it'. 
Citation: Lesson 14.

gaps.explanationNepali:
नदीमा नुहाउने कार्यको लागि 'in' preposition प्रयोग गरिन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ७
gaps.explanationEnglish:
The preposition 'in' is used for bathing in the river. 
Citation: Lesson 7.

gaps.explanationNepali:
'Guides' मानिस हुन्, त्यसैले relative pronoun 'who' प्रयोग गरिन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
gaps.explanationEnglish:
'Guides' are people, so the relative pronoun 'who' is used. 
Citation: Lesson 15.

gaps.explanationNepali:
सल्लाह दिनको लागि 'should' को प्रयोग गरिन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ८
gaps.explanationEnglish:
'Should' is used to give advice. 
Citation: Lesson 8.

gaps.explanationNepali:
यो Type 1 Conditional जस्तो देखिन्छ (If + present... might/will), वा एक सामान्य सत्य। यहाँ 'is not protected' ले वर्तमान अवस्थालाई जनाउँछ जसले भविष्यमा लोप हुने खतरा निम्त्याउँछ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
gaps.explanationEnglish:
This implies a real possibility (Type 1 Conditional structure). If it is not protected now, species might face extinction. 
Citation: Lesson 10.

gaps.explanationNepali:
'make' causative verb हो, जसले active voice मा bare infinitive (v1) लिन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १८
gaps.explanationEnglish:
'make' is a causative verb that takes the bare infinitive (v1) in the active voice. 
Citation: Lesson 18.

gaps.explanationNepali:
यो प्रत्यक्ष प्रश्न (Direct Question) हो (इन्भर्टेड कमा भित्र), त्यसैले 'Wh + auxiliary + subject' को संरचना हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ २
gaps.explanationEnglish:
This is a direct question (inside inverted commas), so it follows the 'Wh + auxiliary + subject' structure. 
Citation: Lesson 2.

gaps.explanationNepali:
पर्यटकहरूले रमाइलो गर्ने भएकाले (कारण), उनीहरू अविष्मरणीय यादहरू लिएर फर्कन्छन् (परिणाम)। त्यसैले 'Therefore' उपयुक्त छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १३
gaps.explanationEnglish:
Since visitors enjoy the activities (cause), they return with memories (result). 'Therefore' fits best. 
Citation: Lesson 13.

questions.titleNepali: दिइएको पाठ पूरा गर्न कोष्ठकबाट सही विकल्पहरू छान्नुहोस् र प्रतिलिपि गर्नुहोस्। (पाठ पुनः लेख्न अनिवार्य छैन।)
questions.titleEnglish: Choose and copy the correct alternatives from the brackets to complete the given text. (Rewriting the text is not compulsory.)
